Uses of Interface
repast.simphony.data2.DataSource

  • Packages that use DataSource 
    Package Description
    repast.simphony.data2  
    repast.simphony.data2.builder  
    repast.simphony.data2.engine  

    • Uses of DataSource in repast.simphony.data2

      Subinterfaces of DataSource in repast.simphony.data2 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AggregateDataSource
      Interface for classes that can function as the source of aggregate data to be logged or charted.
      interface  NonAggregateDataSource
      Interface for classes that can function as the source of non aggregated data to be logged or charted.
      Classes in repast.simphony.data2 that implement DataSource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BatchRunDataSource
      DataSource that returns the current batch run number.
      class  CountDataSource
      AggregateDataSource that returns the count of a particular type of object.
      class  MethodDataSource
      DataSource that retrieves data from a method call on an object.
      class  ParameterDataSource
      DataSource that will return the current value of a parameter.
      class  RandomSeedDataSource
      DataSource that returns the current random seed.
      class  TickCountDataSource
      DataSource that returns the current tick count.
      Constructor parameters in repast.simphony.data2 with type arguments of type DataSource 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractFormatter(java.util.Collection<? extends DataSource> sources, java.lang.String delimiter)
      Creates a Formatter that will format data form the specified sources.
      LineFormatter(java.util.Collection<? extends DataSource> sources, java.lang.String delimiter)
      Creates a Formatter that will format data from the specified sources.
      TabularFormatter(java.util.Collection<? extends DataSource> sources, java.lang.String delimiter)
      Creates a Formatter that will format data form the specified sources.

    • Uses of DataSource in repast.simphony.data2.engine

      Classes in repast.simphony.data2.engine that implement DataSource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AggregateDataSourceWrapper
      An AggregateDataSource implementation that delegates to a wrapped AggregateDataSource for all calls except getting the id.
      class  NonAggregateDataSourceWrapper
      An NonAggregateDataSource implementation that delegates to a wrapped AggregateDataSource for all calls except getting the id.
